name: Mule Run
description:
Based on the book Their Eyes were Watching God. It was made for my english class as our creative project. The game itself is built out of the ordinary to stress the themes and symbols in the book as was important to be in our projects.

Update: Added restart buttons to end screen and allowed for WASD movement. In progress: starting screen, loading screen; Following that will be infinite procedurally generated world.

Possible future plans to change speed you start at, length you have to last for, and other settings TBD

Left and right arrow to move. You automatically go forward and it progressively speeds up.

Credits:

Human model by Eternal Realm

Trees and environment from Unity Asset store by Emotive Robot

Rest of it is made by me
